item.title: MRTK : Paris Motor Show
item.description: Introduction Basically for this project, I tried to get and put to use everything that I had learned throughout the entire course. The obvious firsts steps were to correctly reconfigure the MRTK profiles and builds settings for the scene, since I had corruption troubles for the app and had to start over and redo the first tutorials for MRTK. Setting up Before getting too much into technicalities, it’s important to setup our scene.
